channel.title: CVE Feed for Crocoblock -- JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Crocoblock -- JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-38772|2024-08-01T21:02:25.756Z -- crocoblock -- jetwidgets%20for%20elementor%20and%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Crocoblock JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.1.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-38772|2024-08-01T20:49:54.842Z -- crocoblock -- jetwidgets%20for%20elementor%20and%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Crocoblock JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects JetWidgets for Elementor and WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.1.7.
